english.segment1: You're My Beloved. You're My Bride. To sing over you is My delight. Come away with Me My love
english.segment2: You're Beautiful to Me. So beautiful to Me
english.segment3: Under My mercy. Come and wait. Till we are standing face to face. I see no stain on you. My child
english.segment4: You're Beautiful to Me. So Beautiful to Me
english.segment5: I sing over you My song of peace. Cast all your care down at My feet. Come and find your rest in Me
english.segment6: I'll breathe My life inside of you. I'll bear you up on eagle's wings. And hide you in the shadow of My strength. I'll take you to My quiet waters. I'll restore your soul. Come rest in Me and be made whole
english.segment7: You're My beloved. You're My Bride. To sing over you is my delight. Come away with me my love.
